page.shortlink: api sql namespace result set object data function
page.description: Get the data for the column name or index specified.
page.prototype: Data as A = .Data(ColumnIndex as N | ColumnName as C)

argument.name: Data
argument.description: The value of the specified column in the current row of the result set.

argument.name: SQL::ResultSet
argument.description: A SQL::ResultSet object created with a DIM statement.

argument.name: ColumnIndex
argument.description: The number of the column. The first column is 1.

page.discussion: The Data() method returns the data for the specified column in a SQL::ResultSet.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim rs as SQL::ResultSet dim connString as C dim select_exp as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v8\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" select_exp = "select * from customer where bill_state_region = 'ny'" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.execute(select_exp) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) conn.close() end end if rs = conn.ResultSet rs.NextRow() ui_msg_box("SQL::ResultSet::Data()with column number", rs.data(3)) ui_msg_box("SQL::ResultSet::Data()with column name", rs.data("Lastname")) conn.close()
